analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol#96) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol#101-102)

Reentrancy in Issuer.issue (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- issued (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol)

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol#304-306) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol#305-306)

Issuer.issue (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol)

Reentrancy in Issuer.issue (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- issuedCount (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol)
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol#96)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x285e24c62b716a4d08a903dcfe1e9156bf9069e7.sol:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
